meanings.sent1: My sister is sneezier than me when she has a cold.
meanings.sent2: The flowers made me sneezier than usual due to my allergies.
meanings.sent3: The cat became even sneezier after playing in the dusty attic.
meanings.sent4: The old library was sneezier than a pepper factory during allergy season.
meanings.sent5: The dusty room was so sneezier that it felt like a sneeze waiting to happen.

meanings.sent1: During spring, I am sneezier than in winter because of the pollen.
meanings.sent2: People with allergies are often sneezier around pets.
meanings.sent3: The sneezier boy in class always carries tissues in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: The dusty attic made me feel sneezier than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The field of flowers was so sneezier that everyone started sneezing uncontrollably.

meanings.sent1: The sneezier cat in the house always startles us with its sudden sneezes.
meanings.sent2: The sneezier child in the daycare kept the tissues close by.
meanings.sent3: The sneezier puppy made everyone giggle with its tiny sneezes.
meanings.sent4: The sneezier old man at the park sneezed like a trumpet player.
meanings.sent5: The sneezier room was filled with the sound of constant sneezing.
